name: Those Nights at Randy's REMASTERED (2019)
description:
Full remaster of the 2017 game "Those Nights At Randy's"

You play as a young girl "Sally Bennett" who is a trainee and TAFE student who is taking a work placement at "Randy's Children Café" to earn your Security & Protection certificate. You're put to the test during shifts by your head manger to see if you are worthy of reaching your goals.

Full remaster includes:

+New game mechanics.

+New voice quotes.

+Custom Night.

+ Extras menu.

+Repair Randy minigame/ Dandy Minigame

TropicalGames 2019
